title: Sand Blaster, San Francisco, from "Intimations of Disaster"

description: head and shoulders of person wearing a helmet with a tube at the back and a canvas cloth over back of head and shoulders, seen through an irregular rectangular opening on a wall; chalk marks and arrow on wall under opening
